name: AtoRAG
description: Universal Knowledge Base with RAG capabilities and automatic conversation memory. Store and search any type of content with semantic search.
long_description: AtoRAG by AtonomyAI - Transform any content into a searchable knowledge base. Store documents, CSV data, policies, research papers, meeting notes, or any text through natural conversation. Uses advanced text processing and vector search for intelligent retrieval.

backup_path.title: Backup Directory Path
backup_path.description: Custom directory path for storing backups (optional). If not set, backups will be stored in ~/.atorag/backups/. Recommended: Use a path outside the extension directory to preserve backups when uninstalling.

tools.name: add_document
tools.description: Add a new document to the knowledge base with automatic analysis

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Search for documents using semantic similarity

tools.name: list_documents
tools.description: Browse all stored documents with filtering by type, date, or tags

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Retrieve a specific document by ID

tools.name: delete_document
tools.description: Delete a document from the knowledge base

tools.name: analyze_content
tools.description: Analyze content for readability, key phrases, and insights

tools.name: manage_partitions
tools.description: Create, list, or delete partitions for organizing documents

tools.name: manage_collections
tools.description: Create collections and manage document groupings

tools.name: backup_restore
tools.description: Create backups, restore from backups, or list available backups
